"The Chocolate Way 2":
"This is an unofficial request from me, Xie!
The Naura Cake Shop is back for a limited
time only, right in the heart of Amduscia's
Volcanic Caves!
It's Valentine's Day, so all the girls are
going along to check it out!
You never know who you could meet there!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
